title: Technical Presentation: Microservices Architecture

content.speaker: Presenter
content.text: Welcome to the microservices architecture talk.

content.speaker: Presenter
content.text: We will cover benefits and challenges of distributed systems.

content.speaker: Audience
content.text: How do we handle service discovery?

content.speaker: Presenter
content.text: We use a registry like Eureka or Consul.

content.speaker: Presenter
content.text: Let's dive into circuit breaker patterns.

summary: Covered key microservices patterns including service discovery, load balancing, and resilience strategies.
